isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - CYLINDER HEAD OR REPLACE GASKET; REMOVE & RE-INSTALL

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: CYLINDER HEAD OR REPLACE GASKET; REMOVE & RE-INSTALL
wtsproc.config: Vehicle equipped with air conditioning. It is not necessary to open the air conditioning system.

step1.para: Install wheel chocks and open hood.
Disconnect battery to ground cable, include ECM ground and remove front bumper assembly.
Drain cooling system.
Remove engine splash shield.
Remove air cleaner housing with turbo inlet tube attached, include disconnect IAT sensor.
Remove charge air cooler hoses.
Disconnect alternator wiring from alternator.
Disconnect engine position / timing sensor (CAM), include wire support bracket.
Disconnect engine coolant temperature sensor (ECT).
Disconnect alternator wiring support clamp at alternator for access to heater hoses.
Disconnect water heater hose, include support clamps. Secure hoses out of way.
Disconnect alternator wiring and engine harness from valve cover, include support clamps. Secure out of way.
Disconnect surge tank hose from tank and thermostat housing. Include support clamp.
Disconnect coolant level sensor and freon compressor clutch wire if applicable. Secure harness out of way.
Disconnect engine wiring and connectors to include MAP, ICP and injector wiring at valve cover and secure harness out of way.

note.para: Remove engine harness from plastic clip on left front side of valve cover.

step1.para: Disconnect high pressure oil line from oil/fuel manifold.
Remove fuel line from fuel filter and oil/fuel manifold.
Disconnect air compressor inlet hose from compressor if applicable.
Remove cowl tray assembly, include remove wiper arms and radio antenna.
Remove windshield wiper linkage assembly with motor attached, include disconnect wiring at motor and washer hose.
Disconnect radiator hose at thermostat housing.
Remove engine housing cover, include remove or reposition seat, shifter lever, cup holder and floor mat as necessary.
Remove oil drain hose from turbocharger and block. Remove supply hose from turbocharger and oil cooler.
Disconnect exhaust pipe assembly (turbo outlet) from turbocharger.
Remove turbocharger assembly from exhaust manifold. Cap open ports on turbocharger.
Remove crankcase ventilation pipe from valve cover and block.
Drain radiator coolant from block (plug on oil cooler) and re-install plug.
Remove air conditioning compressor assembly if applicable, reposition out of way and secure. Include disconnect support clamps and belt.

note.para: With 7000 model, remove with bracket attached. All others, remove from water manifold housing.

step1.para: Remove valve/intake cover, include disconnect under valve cover injector harness from valve cover.
Remove valve cover gasket.
Disconnect fuel line from rear of cylinder head.

note.para: Squeeze white clip to release connector.

step1.para: Drain oil/fuel supply manifold of oil.
Remove injector wiring harness, include wire harness channel.
Remove electronic injectors.
Remove rocker arm shaft assembly and push rods.

note.para: Loosen valve lever adjusting screws to prevent damage.

step1.para: Remove cylinder head bolts.
Disconnect hood stop cables and support hood with stand (step performed to increase access for lifting device).
Install lifting device and remove cylinder head from vehicle.
Leak test valves.
Clean all parts and mating surfaces.
Install cylinder head gasket, include install dowl guides if removed.
Install cylinder head to vehicle using lifting device.
Install rocker arm shaft assembly and push rods, include apply oil to bolts.

note.para: Do not tighten bolts at this time.

step1.para: Install cylinder head bolts, include apply oil to bolts.
Torque rocker arm shaft assembly and head bolts to spec., include set rocker arm end play.
Replace injector o-rings (set).
Install electronic injectors and torque to spec.

note.para: Torque shoulder bolts prior to installing injectors.

step1.para: Install injector wiring harness, include install wire harness channel.
Adjust valves.
Connect fuel line to rear of cylinder head.
Install oil/fuel supply manifold plug, include replace o-ring and torque plug.
Install valve/intake cover and gasket, include connect under valve cover harness connector to valve cover. Torque bolts.
Install air conditioning compressor assembly to mount bracket if applicable, include connect support clamps and belt.
Install crankcase ventilation pipe to valve cover and block.
Install turbocharger assembly to exhaust manifold.
Connect exhaust pipe assembly to turbocharger.
Install oil supply hose to turbocharger and oil cooler. Install oil drain hose to turbocharger and block.
Connect radiator hose to thermostat housing using heat gun to shrink clamp.
Install fuel line to fuel filter and oil/fuel manifold.
Connect high pressure oil line to oil/fuel manifold.
Connect engine wiring and connectors to include MAP, ICP and injector wiring at valve cover.

note.para: Install wire harness to plastic clip at valve cover.

step1.para: Connect alternator wiring to alternator.
Connect alternator wiring and engine harness to valve cover, include support clamps.
Connect surge tank hose to tank and thermostat housing, include support clamp at air conditioning compressor.
Connect engine coolant temperature sensor (ECT).
Connect engine position / timing sensor (CAM), include wire support bracket.
Connect water heater hose, include support clamps.
Connect alternator wiring support clamp at alternator.
Connect coolant level sensor, and freon compressor clutch wire if applicable.
Install charge air cooler hoses.
Install air cleaner housing with turbo inlet tube attached, include connect IAT sensor.
Install windshield wiper linkage assembly with motor attached, include connect wiring and washer hose.
Install cowl tray assembly, include install wiper arms and radio antenna.
Connect air compressor inlet hose to compressor if applicable.
Install wire harness ties to hoses and wiring harnesses as needed.
Fill coolant system.
Replace engine oil and oil filter.
Install front bumper assembly.
Connect battery to ground cable, include ECM ground.
Bleed fuel system, start engine and check for leaks.
Top off fluids as needed.
Install engine housing cover, include install seat, shift lever, cup holder and floor mat as required
Install engine cover and close hood.
Remove wheel chocks and check/test operation while road testing vehicle.
